overview:
Joshua Milstein is co-founder and CEO of doormates, a social networking platform that creates private and secure networks for residents in an urban landscape. As CEO, Josh is responsible for managing the growth and development of the company, with a particular focus on product development and sales and marketing. Prior to doormates, Josh spent a year working for Loews Hotels in Orlando, Fl and New York, NY. Josh received his BA in History from Columbia University in 2010. While at Columbia, Josh was the president of Delta Sigma Phi fraternity.

In his free time, Josh lives and breathes everything New York City. This includes giving back to the Columbia community as a member of the Columbia College Young Alumni Fund and the Alumni Corporation Board of Delta Sigma Phi fraternity. Josh also contributes to many of the city’s great organizations, including Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts and Harlem Little League. Josh is an avid sports fan, who, unfortunately, dedicates many of his summers to watching Mets baseball.
